dict.acceptation: 分开，分隔；[数]除法；部门；[军]师；

sent.orig: Set censorial division, vet division, management division, division handling card, division 5 section office.
sent.trans: 设有监察科、检审科、管理科、办证科、综合科5个科室。

sent.orig: Investment Management Division, Banking Division, Corporate Finance Division.
sent.trans: 投资管理部，银行营业部，公司财务部。

sent.orig: Companies with under-embryo division, the cause of the mold, plastic toys Division, automated machinery division.
sent.trans: 公司下设有模胚事业部、模具事业部、塑胶玩具事业部、自动化机械事业部。

sent.orig: And then we add two new divisions: Import & Distribute Division and Machine Vision Division.
sent.trans: 随著时间演进，也成立了进口代理部门及机器视觉部门。

sent.orig: The court of appeal be divided into the civil division and the criminal division.
sent.trans: 上诉法院分成民事上诉庭和刑事上诉庭。
